Eclipse 200303062359

Click ok with no changes.

A known problem and fixed in RC2.
This is the RC2 build.  Do you mean it is in a rebuild?
We are playing with RC2 today and cannot see this problem. Isn't RC2 20030307?

Have you tried it on Linux-gtk? I do not see the problem on windows.

The first RC2 build was at 11:59 last night, so I downloaded that this 
morning.  I know there has been one rebuild since then.
True, I only tried it on windows. Why would Linux be different?
because it is open source :)  I honestly don't know.
I've observed in with all of the motif guys (linux, solaris, aix, hpux).

Do we have editable combo box in Motif, and if we do, can it handle text that 
is not in the list of choices (we will debug anyway, just a quick question).
*** Bug 34320 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 34671 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 34672 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

A trivial problem - we made a substring call in a case where the location of 
the character can be -1 (i.e. not found). We guarded this call with a test for -
1. Verified that it fixes the problem on Linux.
